item.title: Sligo OpenCoffee is ready for launch
item.dc:creator: conor
item.description: The crew in Sligo are kicking off an OpenCoffee and it’s about time! That area is a real hub of business and web activity so it should be very popular. The first one is on April 2nd in the Clarion Hotel in Sligo Town at 11am. All info over on the blog. Best of luck [...]
item.content:encoded:
The crew in Sligo are kicking off an OpenCoffee and it’s about time! That area is a real hub of business and web activity so it should be very popular.

The first one is on April 2nd in the Clarion Hotel in Sligo Town at 11am. All info over on the blog.

Best of luck to the organisers, we look forward to hearing lots more about it.
